Package assignment01

Interface CounterController

All Known Implementing Classes:
Counter
public interface CounterController
CounterController is an interface which is realized by the Counter class. It contains methods that would enable the CounterModel, CounterView and Counter classes interact with each other.
Author:
Abundance Esim, Jaswinder Singh, Jingmei Li

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addModel(CounterModel model)
    This would be used by the controller to register a property change listener(the view) for the model.
    void
    createGUI(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    This is used to create the application's GUI.
    void
    processInput(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textInput)
    This method would be used to process and calculate the number of characters, lines, words and digits in the text input by the user into the text area.

  • Method Details

    • addModel

      void addModel(CounterModel model)
      This would be used by the controller to register a property change listener(the view) for the model.
      Parameters:
      model - The model that requires a listener.

    • createGUI

      void createGUI(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      This is used to create the application's GUI.
      Parameters:
      stage - The application window.

    • processInput

      void processInput(javafx.scene.control.TextArea textInput)
      This method would be used to process and calculate the number of characters, lines, words and digits in the text input by the user into the text area.
      Parameters:
      textInput - The text input in the text area.
